item.title: A few questions relating to allstarscapes classic errors
item.dc:creator: @santa_p_hat santa p hat
item.description:
@santa_p_hat wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:373634”]Allstar is shit, use a different source. PLEASE?

ONTOPIC: LOLOL you change how rare the drop is because you can add more of 1 item there. xD example:

public static int KBD[] = { 15352, 15352, 15352, 15352, 15352, 15352, 15352, 15334,4585, 14519, 4087, 15195}; public static int randomKBD() { return KBD[(int) (Math.random() * KBD.length)]; }

You see how 15352 is repeated? To get the drops from that the server runs through those numbers at random and whatever gets chosen is the drop. Therefore adding more than one itemID will increase the chance of that item

Helped?[/quote]

How the hell did i miss that ffs. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions relating to allstarscapes classic errors
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Allstar is shit, use a different source. PLEASE?

ONTOPIC: LOLOL you change how rare the drop is because you can add more of 1 item there. xD example:

public static int KBD[] = { 15352, 15352, 15352, 15352, 15352, 15352, 15352, 15334,4585, 14519, 4087, 15195}; public static int randomKBD() { return KBD[(int) (Math.random() * KBD.length)]; }

You see how 15352 is repeated? To get the drops from that the server runs through those numbers at random and whatever gets chosen is the drop. Therefore adding more than one itemID will increase the chance of that item

Helped?

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions relating to allstarscapes classic errors

item.title: A few questions relating to allstarscapes classic errors
item.dc:creator: @santa_p_hat santa p hat
item.description:
@santa_p_hat wrote:

Okay this is a few errors I’m having trouble locating, these include.

The barrows Armor requiring 99 range
To eat you must have a weapon equipped
Cooking food in skills

I just need to locate them and i think i can fix them. Except maybe cooking food in skills, i might need a code for that :s

One more thing in allstar scape source is it doesn’t really use the npcdrop.cfg but uses a file called item2.java and it uses that for drops. Stupid… Here’s a code for the kbd

public static int KBD[] = { 15352, 15334,4585, 14519, 4087, 15195}; public static int randomKBD() { return KBD[(int) (Math.random() * KBD.length)]; }

Now how the hell are you supposed to change how rare the drop is! I know it is linked with npchandler.cfg. But i can’t find anything. Please if anyone could answer any of these questions that would be so helpful.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions relating to allstarscapes classic errors
